name: Lookout

grantsPowers.name: Harvesting Power
grantsPowers.description: Passive: Gain Harvest Power Pips while Harvesting

description: Razor-focus and a quickness to react at the first sign of change can be the turning point for a harvester. Reaction to even the slightest change in weakness can lead to greater wealth and riches while harvesting, giving a clear edge to those with a keen eye.
